long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zukini is a simple shopping list extension that sits in your browser for quick spur of the moment ideas.

Use this to track todo items, shopping lists, or more.

To use this extension, simply install and show on your chrome add-on bar. click the icon to get your list and add more items to it using the textbox. To check off items, click them, and to remove them completely, press the "clear checked items" box.
